duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform non-observed and observed urine and breath alcohol collections in various metro Denver locations and Boulder.
Maintain the integrity of the collection process, ensuring the privacy of employees being tested, and the security of the specimen and collection site.
Know and keep current on DOT Urine Specimen Collection Procedures, DOT alcohol testing Procedures, and DOT agency regulations applicable to RTD.
Responsible for approximately ten trips monthly to various RTD locations for testing and collecting purposes.
Timely shipping of specimens and delivery of documentation.
Responsible for assigned RTD equipment, vehicles, and supplies.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. A minimum of one year of DOT collection experience preferred.Must able to take and successfully pass the DOT initial qualification training.
